abstract: Louisiana Lt Gov Billy Nungesser has proposed that state's extension of film and television production incentives should be predicated on state receiving share of profits from films or television series; proposal is meant to address shortfall in state budget from lower oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Billy Nungesser, the lieutenant governor, proposes the state extend incentives in return for a promise that taxpayers will share in profits from any blockbusters.

headline.main: Politician in Louisiana Wants Cut of Hollywood Hits Filmed There
headline.print_headline: A Louisiana Politician Wants a Cut of Hollywood Blockbusters

snippet: Billy Nungesser, the lieutenant governor, proposes the state extend incentives in return for a promise that taxpayers will share in profits from any blockbusters.
